sect2.title: Installation of Tripwire
sect2.para: Compile Tripwire by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../tripwire-&tripwire-version;-gcc3-build-fixes.patch && cd src && make release && cd .. && cp install/install.{sh,cfg} .
